metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:printereffectiverights_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:printereffectiverights_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid not equals is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid with a pattern match is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name pattern match and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name not equals and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.

printereffectiverights_test.comment: Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid not equals is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name and trustee_sid with a pattern match is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name pattern match and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name not equals and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.

printereffectiverights_object.comment: This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid that matches the regular expression '^S-1-5-32-54[0-9]$'.
This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name that matches the regular expression '^Microsoft [A-Z]{3} Document Writer$' and trustee_sid that equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name not equal to 'some_printer_name' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and a trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544' with the resolve_group behavior set to 'true' and the include_group behavior set to 'false'.

This object represents a printereffectiverights_object with a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and a trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544' with the resolve_group behavior set to 'true' and the include_group behavior set to 'true'.

printereffectiverights_state.comment: This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid that matches the regular expression '^S-1-5-32-54[0-9]$'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name that matches the regular expression '^Microsoft [A-Z]{3} Document Writer$' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name not equal to 'some_printer_name' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This state represents a printereffectiverights_object which has a printer_name equal to 'Microsoft XPS Document Writer' and trustee_sid equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
